com.satori.rtm

Interface RtmClientListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RtmClientAdapter

    public interface RtmClientListener
    Listener interface to define application functionality based on client state changes. For example, you can define application functionality when the client connects or disconnects from the RTM Service, when the connection fails, or when a WebSocket transport error, application layer error, or internal error occurs.

    Set an implementation of this interface for the client with RtmClientBuilder.setListener(RtmClientListener).

    RtmClientAdapter is an empty implementation of this interface.

    See Also:
    RtmClientBuilder.setListener(RtmClientListener), RtmClientAdapter

    • Method Detail

      • onConnectingError

        void onConnectingError(RtmClient client,
                       java.lang.Exception ex)
        Called when the client fails to establish a connection to the RTM Service.
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.
        ex - Exception generated by the WebSocket Transport.
        See Also:
        Transport, TransportListener.onConnectingError(Exception)

      • onTransportError

        void onTransportError(RtmClient client,
                      java.lang.Exception ex)
        Called when a transport error occurs when communicating with the RTM Service.
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.
        ex - Exception generated by the WebSocket Transport.
        See Also:
        Transport, TransportListener.onTransportError(Exception)

      • onError

        void onError(RtmClient client,
             java.lang.Exception ex)
        Called when an error occurs in the application because of authentication, Protocol Data Unit (PDU) errors, or JSON errors.

        This method is called when one of the following exceptions occurs in the application:

        • AuthException - Authentication error.
        • PduException - Negative or unexpected PDU received from the RTM Service.
        • InvalidJsonException - Incorrect or invalid JSON format received from the RTM Service.

        Use this method to handle the above errors.

        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.
        ex - Exception generated by the application.
        See Also:
        ConnectionListener.onError(Exception)

      • onEnterStopped

        void onEnterStopped(RtmClient client)
        Called when the client enters the stopped state.

        The client enters the stopped state in the following situations:

        • RtmClient created and initialized with stopped state.
        • RtmClient.stop() method called explicitly.
        • Auto-reconnect disabled and connection drops.
        Parameters:
        client - RTM client.

      • onLeaveStopped

        void onLeaveStopped(RtmClient client)
        Called when the client leaves the stopped state.

        The client leaves the state when you call the RtmClient.start() method.

        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.

      • onEnterConnecting

        void onEnterConnecting(RtmClient client)
        Called when the client enters the connecting state.

        The client enters this state when it attempts to connect to the RTM Service.

        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.

      • onLeaveConnecting

        void onLeaveConnecting(RtmClient client)
        Called when the client leaves the connecting state.

        RtmClient leaves this state when it either successfully connects or fails to connect to the RTM Service.

        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.

      • onEnterConnected

        void onEnterConnected(RtmClient client)
        Called when the client enters the connected state.

        RtmClient enters this state after it has connected to the RTM Service and is able to send and receive messages.

        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.

      • onLeaveConnected

        void onLeaveConnected(RtmClient client)
        Called when the client leaves the connected state.

        The client leaves this state when the connection drops.

        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.

      • onEnterAwaiting

        void onEnterAwaiting(RtmClient client)
        Called when the client enters the awaiting state.

        The client enters this state after the connection to the RTM Service fails and auto-reconnect is enabled.

        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.

      • onLeaveAwaiting

        void onLeaveAwaiting(RtmClient client)
        Called when the client leaves the awaiting state.

        The client leaves this state when it enters the connecting state and attempts to reconnect.

        Parameters:
        client - RTM client instance.
